creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: large covered drinking cup with knights in small cartouches around top; leaf design at center; oval medallions lining widest portion in lower half; inscription at top
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription

inscribed in plate monogram in plate, lower left: [HSB]; date in plat
provenance: C.G. Boerner, Düsseldorf, stock no. ZU8202, until 1970s; Hauswedell & Nolte, Hamburg, sold to Lewis; [R.E. Lewis & Daughter, Nicasio, Calif., until June 1972; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Double Goblet with Oval Medallions
